name: pellucid-ai-marketplace
description: Pellucid AI Alignment Data Marketplace - Complete System

scripts.start:python: cd pellucid-labeling-api && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.start:privacy: cd pellucid-labeling-api && source venv/bin/activate && python privacy_service.py
scripts.start:visualization: cd pellucid-labeling-api && source venv/bin/activate && python visualization_service.py
scripts.install:all: cd pellucid-marketplace && npm install && cd ../pellucid-labeling-api && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.status: echo 'Checking service status...' && lsof -i :3000,8000,8001,8002 || echo 'No services running on expected ports'

author: Pellucid AI Team
